item.title: Letters - In response to 'Your union president speaks on RAG mag 'sexism'', Issue 1626
item.author: Alicia Graham,
item.description: Dear Lucinda, I read your article last week and would like to reply to some of the accusations directed at us. The RAG mag is made to be accessible and funny. Thus, as the union president, an article about you was published as you would be known by a lot of students. Having read the article I do not â€¦
